channel.title: org-mode on New Linux User
channel.description: Recent content in org-mode on New Linux User

item.title: Emacs Exports to PDF
item.description: Doom Emacs After hearing about Emacs for some time, I began using it last year. Initially, I hesitated due to its steep learning curve and the time investment it required. However, the challenge has been quite rewarding. Emacs has revolutionized my daily computer interactions. Although I used to rely heavily on the mouse, Emacs has shifted my workflow to be more keyboard-centric, enhancing my overall experience. The standout feature for me is Org-mode, which has significantly improved my productivity.
